name: Cards On Fire: Desktop Version
description:
The Desktop version of the Free To Play Web Game : Cards On Fire

Why should you get the Desktop Version if the Web version is free?

- Better Performance

you will be running the game off your own hard drive or SSD, which will give you far better performance than connecting to a servers hard drive over the internet.

- No Loading Time

You don't have to download files every time you play, you only have to download them once when you want the latest version.

- Doesn't Require Internet Connection

Once it's on your Hard drive, you don't to need connect to the internet to play.

- You can choose when to Update

If you're happy with the current version of the game that you have, you don't have to update, so in future you can wait until there's a big update that takes your fancy.

- More Stability

You're less likely to get weird errors or compatibility issues caused by browsers and browser apps.

- Bonus Content

In future you will get access to bonus content (such as guides, desktop backgrounds, digital art books and more).

Cards On Fire is a Casual Idle game about collecting cards, defeating enemies and getting to abilities to fight stronger and stronger enemies.
